channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Release Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Release Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2292|2024-08-04T07:01:41.274Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20release%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Release Plugin 2.10.2 and earlier does not escape the release version in badge tooltip, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Release/Release permission.
